casebody.data:
Burger et al., Appellees, v. McGhee et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Burger v. McGhee (1990), 49 Ohio St. 3d 84.]

(No. 89-2049 Submitted January 23, 1990 Decided February 21, 1990.) Weick, Gibson & Lowry, Michael J. Moran and Leslie S. Graske, for appellees. Roetzel & Andress, Edward A. DiGiantonio and Deborah A. Mahusky, for appellants. Appellants’ motion to certify the record is allowed.

This cause is reversed on authority of Menefee v. Queen City Metro (1990), 49 Ohio St. 3d 27, 550 N.E. 2d 181.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
